message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Seems fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll give you a little more, but I'm not giving away the farm! Let's call it a deal?
Come on, Alice, it's only fair I get a bigger share. Inflation isn't affecting me, after all!
I'm not sure we're going to agree, Bob.  But I'm willing to meet you halfway.  This is my final offer.
